lines.text: How about that nightlight I asked you for?
King You Pussy!
Bite me Poe!
So how long have you been in here?
25 Years. I steal the golden ticket and Cujo gets to use it.
Excuse me kitty. I'll be right back after I choke my monkey!
No I wasn't in a coma! Alright I was in a coma but it wasn't like I was IN A COMA and goofing off, I was thinking up hilarious new bits the whole time!
The woman I love is living with a horny little monkey that looks like me.
What a lucky girl!
I left my number in your undies!

[fustrated]
I can't believe it, we give him a body and he sends us dogs? This is so humiliating!

[stroking Hypnos]
Let's not think about dogs... Let's think about pussycats...
It looks so... new.
Well that's because it is new!
But the heirloom - your grandmother's ring...
What? You want a used ring?

[while in a van chasing Organ Donor Stu]
Wait! We're doctors! We don't want to hurt you, we just want some organs!
What is wrong with my neck?
You broke it, you're an organ donor!
So I thought what the hell I'm a big celebrity now, I can get all the chicks I want. Why get married? But on the other hand if you are married, no more stink eye. Plus they can't testify against you.
Testify about what?
Ladies and Gentlemen, forget about the naked man with the purple face.
[Stu goes into a phone booth to call the authorities and report the car crash, unaware that a large red pipe loosened by the crash is starting to tilt over towards the booth]

[sees the pipe start to move]
Stu!
[Stu turns around a waves to her, then turns back to the phone as the pipe starts to fall]

[screams]
STU!
[Stu waves at her again, and the pipe falls on the booth, putting Stu in a coma]

[sitting at the controls of a tower monster]
I do like to dress up when I come down town. So, how was she?
[meaning Julie]

[standing on the monster's right hand]
She was... she was beautiful. Of course I was decomposing at the time but... at least now she knows how much I love her.

[looking nervous]
Uh, excuse me, Death... I hate to break up this little love test, but my little bladder is about to burst.
[Death pulls a lever, and the hand Monkeybone is on swings over Stu]

[screams]
BUT I'VE *REALLY* GOTTA GO!
[the hand covers Stu, then rises off him revealing Monkeybone has disappeared]

[feeling his head]
Where, where's Monkeybone?
Back in your head where he belongs. I don't wanna hurt your feelings Stu, but on your own you're a tad vinilla, so I didn't want to send you back without him.

[surprised]
You're wha... did you? You're sending my *back*?

[sure]
Yes. I'm sending you back.
Thank you. Death...
I like you. I'll take the South Park guys instead I hear they're dying to meet me.
[chuckles]
Come on Stu. Turn round.

[turns around]
Like this?
Yeah, uh-huh.
[looks up]
Stu, little higher.
[Stu steps higher up the palm, and the other hand comes up behind him]
See ya!
[the finger springs off the the thumb, sending Stu back]

[racing towards the Ambulance with other doctors carrying the loaner body and Stu's body]
Excuse me! That's our corpse. We've been chasing him all over town.

[sitting in the driver seat]
Help yourself pal.

[pulling the cover off the loaner body]
All right smart-ass you prepare to co-operate now?
[Stu sits up, scaring the doctors]
[last lines]

[Buster runs over to Stu, who is near a fountain]
Hey buddy! How are ya?
[chuckles]
How are ya?
[Stu stands up and sees Julie, who is by the fountain]

[looks into Stu's eyes]
Is it you? Is it really you this time?
[they kiss and the camera turns to Herb, who is in the water near the fountain]

[to the camera]
People, for the love of God, take off your clothes. Take *off* your clothes!
[the scenery turns to cartoon, Herb flies away, a number of people remove their clothing and become monkeys]
Back in the pack!
